comment: Main text block containing Chinese characters in vertical columns, with large header characters and smaller annotations or definitions. The layout is typical of classical Chinese dictionaries or lexicons, such as the *Shuowen Jiezi*. The text includes both large character forms (likely seal script) and smaller explanatory text in regular script. The left margin contains page numbers or section indicators ('六十一', '说文五下', '十', '唐文').
